akas from release info: Saúdem Todos o Rei Julien Brazil
Roi Julian! L'Élu des lémurs France
Salve, rei Julien! Spain (Catalan title) (dubbed version)
Çok Yasa, Kral Julien Turkey (Turkish title)

1.title: Julien 2.0
1.plot: King Julien wants a do-over to become King JULIEN 2.0 and actually listen to his people. But when everyone feels their voice is the most important, the kingdom becomes a chaotic mess.

2.title: Spin Cycle
2.plot: When a segment on Xixi's show changes the kingdom, Julien begins scheming ways to use the influence of the show to his advantage and creates a Julien-centric propaganda machine.

3.title: Night Creatures
3.plot: King Julien can't sleep so he decides to go on a milk cleanse to help, but after Todd is attacked by a horrible monster, King Julien's nightmares cause the kingdom to question him as...The Night Creature.

4.title: Tears in the Drain
4.plot: When Detective King Julien searches for a missing Butterfish, he notices lemurs acting strange all around and realizes he has a serious mystery on his hands, so he must get the Mystery Solving Team back together.

5.title: Squad Goals
5.plot: When King Julien's consultant tells him that his squad is losing their cool, King Julien decides to get a whole new crew.

6.title: One More Cup, Part 2
6.plot: King Julien discovers tea which becomes a huge hit throughout the kingdom, but when Karl's brother Bruce invites him to his coffee corporation, trouble start to brew.

7.title: There Will Be Juice
7.plot: When a crate of "PURE ORGANIC IMPOSSIBLY SAFE ORGANIC NUTRIENTS" washes onto shore, King Julien accidentally overfeeds the crops, creating a giant mango that tries to take over the world.

8.title: Blackboard Jungle
8.plot: King Julien organizes an Academic Bowl to prove the lemurs are the smartest on the island.

9.title: Karl-Mageddon
9.plot: In honor of his retirement, Karl hosts an elaborate contest to find his successor - who will become Madagascar's next super villain.

10.title: King Julien Is Watching You
10.plot: King Julien discovers surveillance equipment and installs it all over the kingdom.

11.title: Lord of the Fruit Flies
11.plot: King Julien tries to rig an election so that Maurice becomes Mango Prime Minister but soon realizes his opponent, Mort, has a better shot than everyone thinks.

12.title: The End Is Near
12.plot: When King Julien learns that Clover may marry Sage, he sets out to prepare the kingdom for post-Clover attacks.

13.title: The End Is Here
13.plot: When King Julien and the gang bury Sage for his bachelor party, things don't go according to plan and they must deal with Franken-Sage.

1.title: King Me
1.plot: Uncle King Julien abdicates his throne, handing off his crown to Prince Julien. Let the reign of King Julien the Thirteenth begin.

2.title: Poll Position
2.plot: King Julien learns that 99% of the lemurs love him, so he makes it his mission to find and convert his one "hater."

3.title: Enter the Fanaloka
3.plot: The evil genius Karl sets out to destroy King Julien. When both Clover and Maurice are captured, King Julien must save them from his new nemesis.

4.title: Empty Is the Head
4.plot: Exhausted by settling his lemur subject's disagreements, King Julien replaces himself with a dummy king so he can play hooky, unwittingly sparking a rebellion.

5.title: Return of the Uncle King
5.plot: Uncle King Julien, set on reclaiming his throne, convinces Julien to go into Foosa territory. Julien creates a Foosa disguise and forces Maurice to help him.

6.title: Eat Prey Shove
6.plot: Clover is forced to take a vacation, and while she's away, she meets the handsome and free-spirited Sage Moondancer.

7.title: He Blinded Me with Science
7.plot: Julien teams up with Timo the tenrec, a scientist who the king enlists to automate everything in the kingdom.

8.title: Viva Mort
8.plot: While Julien is busy atoning for offending Maurice, Mort is busy joining a new political group...one that advocates the overthrowing of the current king.

9.title: The Really Really Big Lie
9.plot: When Julien ruins a young lemur's birthday party, he comes up with an elaborate tale to cover his social gaff.

10.title: One More Cup
10.plot: When King Julien discovers a bag of coffee beans on the island, it isn't long before the entire kingdom is hooked on caffeine.

1.title: My Fair Foosa
1.plot: Seeking to maintain the balance in his kingdom, Julien captures a foosa and attempts to domesticate it into a lemur.

2.title: Diapers Are the New Black
2.plot: King Julien discovers a box of diapers and after experimenting with them he kicks off an island craze which sparks a fashion war.

3.title: Crimson and Clover
3.plot: King Julien discovers his true love, but the problem is it's his body guard's sister.

4.title: Pineapple of My Eye
4.plot: Seeking the wisdom of the past kings, Julien is duped into believing that a pineapple contains their spirit. While this makes him happy, others in the kingdom are not so thrilled.

5.title: Gimme Gimme Gimme: The Game
5.plot: After stumbling upon a Monopoly-type game, members of the kingdom decide to play. As the craze catches on, everyone becomes involved in a real-world version which creates its own set of problems.

6.title: Body Double
6.plot: Dealing with the crocodiles is never fun for the lemur king, so Julien decides to find a body double to serve as his protection during negotiations.

7.title: Election
7.plot: King Julien rescues an old lemur by the name of Doc Sugarfoot from a cave thought to be inhabited by the gods. After Julien takes him on as a special advisor, a power struggle for the kingdom ensues.

8.title: Daddy Julien
8.plot: Wishing he was a father, King Julien convinces himself that Mort is his true heir and enters him in the Junior Gent pageant.

9.title: That's Sooo Rob
9.plot: King Julien's best friend from the past, Rob, shows up out of nowhere and leads Julien back into his wild partying ways.

10.title: The Man in the Iron Booty
10.plot: King Julien is tricked into giving away the resources of his kingdom by two rivals from his past.

11.title: Monkey Planet
11.plot: In an effort to claim the moon for his kingdom, Julien and his entourage blast off to the moon. Thinking they've arrived they run into an interesting guest.

12.title: True Bromance
12.plot: When Julien learns that Maurice is advising the rats, their friendship is put in jeopardy.

13.title: The King Who Would Be King
13.plot: Maurice reveals a book to Julien where stories of the past lemur kings are recorded. Unknown to him, Clover begins documenting his legacy with made up stories which are offensive to some.

14.title: Are You There, Frank? It's Me, King Julien
14.plot: The Sky God demands that King Julien be sacrificed to appease it. Disturbed by this revelation, King Julien creates his own new god.

15.title: The Phantom of Club Moist
15.plot: Fulfilling his lifelong dream, King Julien opens his own nightclub, Club Moist. With Mort as his star attraction things are going great, but then the phantom appears.

16.title: King Juli-END?
16.plot: Doc S diagnoses King Julien with Mad Horse disease. Now Julien's rule of his kingdom is in jeopardy.

1.title: Oh Captain! My Captain! Pt.1
1.plot: Julien is missing and mango's are in short supply. Village life couldn't get any crazier . . . that is, until Julien's royally annoying parents arrive.

2.title: Oh Captain! My Captain! Pt.2
2.plot: Clover and Mort race to rescue their king as Julien tries to avoid the pirates' plank by showing off his prime "pirate recruit" booty moves.

3.title: Dance, Dance, Resolution
3.plot: As his parents prepare to leave, Julien tries to reclaim his childhood by forcing them to attend the dance recital they missed when he was a kid.

4.title: Oh Brother Where Aren't Thou?
4.plot: When his parents grant his wish for a brother by adopting the socially toxic Brodney, Julien goes overboard making Brodney feel like a royal.

5.title: Love Gauntlet
5.plot: King Julien tries to get rid of his parents, but when evil Karl traps them in the Love Gauntlet they must prove their family's strength to survive.

6.title: The Jungle Games
6.plot: After making a bet against Uncle King Julien, King Julien must win the "Jungle Games" in order to maintain control of the royal crown.

7.title: Close Encounters of the Mort Kind
7.plot: When Mort is abducted by "aliens", King Julien teams with Clover, Maurice and Hector to investigate why he's not the one being abducted.

8.title: The Butterfly War
8.plot: King Julien declares a war against butterflies to raise his kingdom's spirit, but when the village is destroyed he decides to hold a peace summit.

9.title: Fast Food Lemur Nation
9.plot: Eager to create fast food for the kingdom, Julien holds an idea contest. But will the winning entry be a dinning delight or a cooking curse?

10.title: Get Off My Lawn
10.plot: When King Julien thinks he's a crime victim, he buys the village self-defense scorpions from a shady dealer, leaving everyone armed and dangerous.

11.title: Revenge of the Prom
11.plot: The gang joins King Julien at his Lemur School Reunion, but the party gets out of control when his old prom date, Karen, shows up for revenge.

12.title: Eye of the Clover
12.plot: Clover wants to follow in her Grandma Rose's footsteps and compete at the dangerous Tournament of Doom, but King Julien forbids her to attend.

13.title: Run for the Border
13.plot: When King Julien hosts the ultimate party, his Boom Box breaks, the kingdom becomes too crowded and he builds a giant wall to surround the kingdom.

1.title: The All Hail King Julien Show
1.plot: King Julien launches a new TV channel called "Julien-Vision" but quickly realizes that the kingdom only wants to watch a reality show of his own life.

2.title: The Neverending Clover
2.plot: After Clover is knocked unconscious, the entire kingdom plays along when she wakes up believing she's living in a make-believe storybook world.

3.title: Who Arted?
3.plot: King Julien is crazy with jealousy and throws out the kingdom's art after he is upstaged by Mort who is now the town's hottest new artist.

4.title: That Sinking Feeling
4.plot: When Masikura convinces King Julien that the island is sinking, Julien believes building an ark is the only way to save his people.

5.title: The Jungle Rooster
5.plot: When the Jungle Rooster keeps him up at night, Julien discovers that the Foosa have been farming chickens for food and risks his life to free them all.

6.title: The Good Book
6.plot: Julien hires Croc Ambassador, an etiquette expert, to teach the kingdom how to behave at a classy ball, but everyone is too uptight to party.

7.title: The King and Mrs. Mort
7.plot: With Julien sick and the others away on a cruise, Mort poses as king to entertain a judge from a big competition -- with disastrous results.

8.title: King Julien Superstar!
8.plot: Julien, Clover, Mort and Maurice become music sensations overnight, but the band breaks up over Julien and Clover's non-stop fighting.

9.title: The Panchurian Candidate
9.plot: After Uncle King Julien turned Pancho into a deadly killer so he could take back his throne, King Julien must save the kingdom before it's too late.

10.title: The Wrath of Morticus Khan
10.plot: King Julien clones himself but things take a turn for the worse when Morticus Khan, an evil warlord, unleashes an army of Mort clones on the kingdom.

11.title: Koto, Plain and Tall
11.plot: Julien is lost in the jungle and accidentally saves a Mountain Lemur named Koto who turns out to be the biggest threat the kingdom has ever faced.

12.title: I, Maurice
12.plot: When Maurice learns that he isn't a lemur like everyone else, he sets off on a journey to find his Aye-Aye parents and sister Brosalind.

13.title: Un-King Me
13.plot: When the kingdom is overrun with refugees, Julien is shocked that an old friend Koto and his Mountain Lemur army are preparing to attack.

imdb.plot outline: King Julien is here to party, and no one can stop him from ruling with an iron fist... in the air, wavin' like he just doesn't care! ALL HAIL KING JULIEN brings the wild world of Madagascar to a totally original, totally hilarious and totally insane television series in which the king takes on the craziest adventures the jungle has to offer. A new cast of fantastic, colorful characters joins King Julien himself, along with his second-in-command, Maurice, and his longtime devotee, Mort. It's a riot of color - not to mention a laugh riot - when viewers ALL HAIL KING JULIEN!
imdb.title: All Hail King Julien
plot: Animated misadventures of a hard-partying lemur and his wild friends in Madagascar.::Jwelch5742

King Julien is here to party, and no one can stop him from ruling with an iron fist... in the air, wavin' like he just doesn't care! ALL HAIL KING JULIEN brings the wild world of Madagascar to a totally original, totally hilarious and totally insane television series in which the king takes on the craziest adventures the jungle has to offer. A new cast of fantastic, colorful characters joins King Julien himself, along with his second-in-command, Maurice, and his longtime devotee, Mort. It's a riot of color - not to mention a laugh riot - when viewers ALL HAIL KING JULIEN!

A prequel cartoon series to the Madagascar animated films, see how King Julien XIII got his start as the King of the Lemurs! Featuring Maurice, Mort, the Fossa, as well as some new characters exclusive to this series, such as Julien's ultra-protective bodyguard named Clover; see how King Julien helps his Kingdom shake their booties, party, and learn to enjoy life a little more!::Jwelch5742
